content.title: Chief Minister Samagra Gramya Unnayan Yojana
content.details: The main objective of the mission is to double the farm income, in unison with the vision of Hon'ble Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi. Under CMSGUY, there is a proposal to initiate massive investments in rural areas for complete rural empowerment in a period of five years through focused interventions.
benefits: The Government of Assam has launched Samagra Gramya Unnayan Yojana.
Farm mechanisms will be enhanced in the state and double-cropping will be facilitated.
One tractor unit consisting of one tractor including its accessories will be provided to the selected beneficiary group in the revenue village.
This tractor will be provided at a subsidized rate.
The government is going to provide a subsidy of 70% to the beneficiary subject to a maximum of 5.5 lakhs.
This subsidy will be admissible on the lowest price of tractors in the government-notified list.
The benefit of this scheme will be provided to a group of 8 to 10 members who are actual adult farmers of the same village.
eligibility: The benefit of this scheme will be provided to any group of 8 to 10 members who are actual adult farmers of the same village.
The group of farmers must have a common bank account and will apply jointly with the signatures of each member.
The applicant group should not have more than one member from one family.
exclusions: Government employees are not allowed to apply to the scheme.
The scheme shall not be allowed to avail for the individual farmer.
content.application_process: Applicants have to go to the nearest office of the Agriculture Department, ask for the application form, fill it out, attach all required documents, and submit it to the Agriculture Department.

faqs.question: What is the benefit to farmers with this scheme?
faqs.answer: The farmers can enhance farm mechanization in the state and to facilitate double cropping.

faqs.question: What is the mission of this scheme?
faqs.answer: The Mega Mission is planning its activities to bring the desired change in the rural areas of the state.

faqs.question: What is the aims of this scheme in 5 years?
faqs.answer: The main aim is to double the farm income in five years.

faqs.question: Do the farmers have to pay the full amount for tractor?
faqs.answer: The group will provide tractors to the farmers on a rental basis.

faqs.question: What is the subsidy rate available to the applicant?
faqs.answer: The subsidy at the rate of 70% will be available to the applicant group on the total cost of the tractor unit.

faqs.question: Who can avail this scheme?
faqs.answer: Any group of 8-10 members who are the actual adult farmers of the same village.

faqs.question: How many members can take part from one family?
faqs.answer: The applicant group should not have more than one member from one family.

faqs.question: What type of bank account the farmers should have?
faqs.answer: The group should have a common bank account.

faqs.question: Does the applicant group have the right to choose the name of the brand and model out of the list notified by the State Govt?
faqs.answer: The applicant group is free to choose all/any/none of the implements.

faqs.question: What is the minimum period on a rental basis to provide the tractor?
faqs.answer: The group shall be liable to provide tractor unit on rental basis for a minimum period of five years.
